data.name: iOSDevUK
data.description: iOSDevUK started in 2011 as the UK’s first conference for iPhone developers, and has attracted hundreds of developers to Aberystwyth each year since then. It runs from 4pm on Monday until 1pm on Thursday, followed by an optional Hack. It is very much a community event, with a broad range of spea…

relatedRecords.name: .droidcon Greece
relatedRecords.description: .droidconGreece is where the industry’s leading Android experts converge to support the Android platform and create a strong network for developers and companies. Starting with 200 attendees in 2015, we will attract well over 750+ developers in 2019.

relatedRecords.name: Garden of Now
relatedRecords.description: Smartphones. Smartwatches. Social Media. IoT devices. Artificial Intelligence. Automation. All the technology developed in the last decades is changing our world at enormous scales and at a crazy-fast pace.
